categories.name: Strength Training
categories.description: Exercises focused on building muscle strength and power

categories.name: Cardio
categories.description: Cardiovascular exercises for heart health and endurance

exercises.name: Push-ups
exercises.description: Classic bodyweight exercise for upper body strength
instructions: Start in a plank position with hands slightly wider than shoulders
Keep your body in a straight line from head to heels
Lower your body until your chest nearly touches the floor
Push back up to the starting position
Maintain control throughout the movement
tips: Keep your core engaged throughout the movement
Don't let your hips sag or pike up
Start with knee push-ups if standard push-ups are too difficult

exercises.name: Burpees
exercises.description: Full-body high-intensity exercise combining squat, plank, and jump
instructions: Start standing with feet shoulder-width apart
Squat down and place hands on the floor
Jump feet back into a plank position
Perform a push-up (optional)
Jump feet back to squat position
Explosively jump up with arms overhead
tips: Land softly to protect your joints
Modify by stepping back instead of jumping

exercises.name: Downward Dog
exercises.description: Yoga pose that stretches the hamstrings, calves, and shoulders
instructions: Start on hands and knees in table-top position
Tuck toes under and lift hips up and back
Straighten legs and press heels toward the floor
Create an inverted V-shape with your body
Hold the position and breathe deeply
tips: Keep a slight bend in knees if hamstrings are tight
Keep your head relaxed between your arms

exercises.name: Squats
exercises.description: Fundamental lower body exercise targeting glutes and quadriceps
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, toes slightly pointed out
Lower your body by pushing hips back and bending knees
Keep chest up and knees tracking over toes
Lower until thighs are parallel to the floor
Push through heels to return to starting position
tips: Keep your weight on your heels
Start with bodyweight before adding resistance

exercises.name: Jumping Jacks
exercises.description: Simple cardio exercise that gets your heart rate up
instructions: Start standing with feet together and arms at sides
Jump while spreading feet to shoulder-width
Simultaneously raise arms overhead
Jump back to starting position
Repeat in a rhythmic motion
tips: Land softly on the balls of your feet
Modify by stepping side to side instead of jumping
